nodes.text: The PU-36 modulator chip was a type of chip that was used in starship sublight engines.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Trandoshan Xirossk stole a PU-36 chip from a starship that was used by the Heroes of Cularin. The chip was stolen after they landed on Burnout space station to refuel. Without the chip, the engines and the ship's power core could not work, so the heroes set out in pursuit of Xirossk. The Trandoshan eventually returned the chip to the heroes and they refitted it to their ship.
